description: A command-line interface application for managing a todo list. Users can add, list, complete, and delete tasks, which are stored in a local JSON file. The application is structured into modules for the CLI interface, task management service, and a persistence layer.

modules.description: This module handles the command-line interface, parsing user commands and invoking the appropriate services. It depends on the task service module to perform operations and the persistence module to save and load tasks.

classes.description: The CLI class is responsible for parsing command-line arguments and executing the corresponding actions. It interacts with the TaskService to manage tasks and uses the Storage class to persist changes.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Executes the main loop of the CLI, parsing user input and dispatching commands to the appropriate methods.

modules.description: This module provides the core task management functionality, including adding, listing, completing, and deleting tasks. It interacts with the persistence layer to ensure tasks are stored and retrieved correctly.

classes.description: The TaskService class manages the lifecycle of tasks, providing methods to add, list, complete, and delete tasks. It ensures tasks are correctly updated in the storage layer.

fields.name: tasks
fields.description: A list of Task objects representing the current state of the todo list. It is updated whenever tasks are added, completed, or deleted.

methods.name: add_task
methods.description: Adds a new task to the list and persists it using the storage layer.

parameters.name: task_description
parameters.description: The description of the task to be added.

methods.name: list_tasks
methods.description: Returns a list of all current tasks, including their completion status.

methods.name: complete_task
methods.description: Marks a task as completed and updates the storage layer.

parameters.name: task_id
parameters.description: The ID of the task to be marked as completed.

methods.name: delete_task
methods.description: Deletes a task from the list and updates the storage layer.

parameters.name: task_id
parameters.description: The ID of the task to be deleted.

modules.description: This module handles the storage and retrieval of tasks from a local JSON file. It provides methods to load tasks at startup and save changes as they occur.

classes.description: The Storage class is responsible for reading from and writing to a JSON file that stores the tasks. It ensures data integrity and handles file I/O operations.

fields.name: file_path
fields.description: The path to the JSON file where tasks are stored. It is used for all read and write operations.

methods.name: load_tasks
methods.description: Loads tasks from the JSON file and returns them as a list of Task objects.

methods.name: save_tasks
methods.description: Saves the current list of tasks to the JSON file.

parameters.name: tasks
parameters.description: The list of tasks to be saved.

tests.description: Tests the core functionality of the TaskService class, including adding, listing, completing, and deleting tasks. It verifies that tasks are correctly managed and persisted.
Tests the Storage class for correct reading and writing of tasks to the JSON file. It checks data integrity and error handling during file operations.
